foreignData.name: Pestilenzratten
foreignData.text: Die Stärke der Pestilenzratten entspricht der Anzahl an anderen Ratten im Spiel, egal unter wessen Kontrolle. Wenn beispielsweise, zwei andere Ratten im Spiel sind, haben die Pestilenzratten Stärke und Widerstandskraft 2/3.

name: Pestilence Rats
originalText: Pestilence Rats has power equal to the total number of other Rats in play, no matter who controls them. For example, as long as there are two other Rats in play, Pestilence Rats has power and toughness 2/3.

rulings.text: Does not count itself for determining power. It only counts other Rats.

text: Pestilence Rats's power is equal to the number of other Rats on the battlefield. (For example, as long as there are two other Rats on the battlefield, Pestilence Rats's power and toughness are 2/3.)
